issue_title: [Bug] CLI add command and TodoApp.add() do not strip whitespace from todo text, inconsistent with Todo.rename() behavior

triage_summary.root_cause: Todo.__init__ did not strip whitespace from text, creating inconsistency with Todo.rename() and TodoApp.add() which both strip whitespace

fix_summary.approach: Added self.text = self.text.strip() in Todo.__post_init__() to normalize whitespace handling across all entry points
